metadata.title: CVE-2022-48756 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dsi: invalid parameter check in msm_dsi_phy_enableThe function performs a check on the "phy" input parameter, however, itis used before the check.Initialize the "dev" variable after the sanity check to avoid a possibleNULL pointer dereference.Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493860 ("Null pointer dereference")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
